name: Where in the World Is Carmen Sandiego? Deluxe Edition
name_original: Where in the World Is Carmen Sandiego? Deluxe Edition
description:
Where in the World Is Carmen Sandiego? Deluxe Edition is an educational game developed by Broderbund Software. It came out on 01-01-1990. It was published by Broderbund Software. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Where in the World Is Carmen Sandiego? Deluxe Edition on PC.
